overview: A film about social crime such as gangsterism. Aeril Zafrel stars as the hard-hitting hero of the film alongside newcomer Niezam, while actress Wawa Zainal plays his love interest, who is caught between his dangerous lifestyle and her love for him.
tagline: Pukul Aku Sampai Mati [Hit Me Till I'm Dead]
title: Budak Pailang
